WARNING: There are spam emails from "travellerpoint.org" targeting participants of CEN 2023. The emails ask to provide arrival and departure dates and credit card details. Do not reply to these scam emails and do not provide any personal information!
:::


The following hotels have conference block bookings from 3<sup>rd</sup> to 7<sup>th</sup> of September 2023 (4 nights):

### [Hotel Spalentor, 4*](https://www.hotelspalentor.ch)
**Location:** Schönbeinstrasse 1, 4056 Basel (8 min walk from venue)  
**Rate:** Approx. CHF 170.- (including breakfast)  
**Booking:** Write an e-mail to [info@hotelspalentor.ch](mailto:info@hotelspalentor.ch) or call (+41 61 262 26 26) with keyword "CEN2023 Conference".  


### [Hotel Odelya, 3*](https://www.odelya.ch)
**Location:** Missionsstrasse 21, 4055 Basel (9 min walk from venue)  
**Rate:** CHF 160/200.- for single/double room (including breakfast)  
**Booking:** Write an e-mail to [hotel@odelya.ch](mailto:hotel@odelya.ch) or call (+41 61 260 21 21) with keyword "CEN2023 Conference"  

### [Hotel D, 4*](https://www.hoteld-basel.ch/)
**Location:** Blumenrain 19, 4051 Basel (11 min walk from venue)  
**Rate:** CHF 157.- for single room (inclusive breakfast)  
**Booking:** You can book online with promo code CEN2023  

### [Hotel Ibis Bahnhof Basel, 2*](https://all.accor.com/hotel/6510/index.en.shtml)
**Location:** Margarethenstrasse 35, 4053 Basel (3 minutes walk to Bahnhof SBB, ~25 minutes to venue by tram)  
**Rate:** CHF 135.- (breakfast not included)  
**Booking:** Write an e-mail to [H6510@accor.com](mailto:H6510@accor.com) oder call (+41 61 201 07 07) with booking code "CEN2023 Conference"  

### [Motel One, 3*](https://www.motel-one.com/en/hotels/basel/hotel-basel/)
**Location:** Barfüssergasse 16, 4051 Basel (~9 tram trip to Bahnhof SBB, ~15 minutes to venue by tram)  
**Rate:** 03.-04.09.2023 - CHF 148.50, Rate: 04.-07.09.2023 - CHF 178.50 per night in THE ONE Queen (breakfast included)  
**Booking:** Write an e-mail to [res.basel@motel-one.com](mailto:res.basel@motel-one.com) with keyword "CEN2023 Conference"
